channel.title: Donation Shop
channel.description:
I got a "Donate Zone" on server, I use Lucky Scape (Credit to the one who made it, forgot name) But when I talk to shop man I see items but I can't buy them, they got a price but nothing happens when I click on it.
And maybe someone got a "Admin Zone" I can have or something with a shop etc, I'm kinda new for script etc and my friend is off for hollyday for a week. So what to do? Any help, +rep If I can do that for someone. Hope anyone got a "Admin Zone" etc I can have and how to make a command like ::staff to go there.

item.title: Donation Shop
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

[quote=“knockudown, post:5, topic:387718”][quote author=TimeBroken link=topic=483513.msg3542129#msg3542129 date=1300933798]
I don’t have MSN or TeamViewer on this computer.

Just search in the tutorial section on how to add shops.
Google does wonders aswell.
[/quote]
i could help you my msn name is porjectkilldonor@hotmail.com, i also have teamviewer.

Where to place the teleport thingy? how to see cords? Just under NPC or commands etc?

Btw Why it Won’t let me buy items from Donate shop? Its cost “Coins” normal coins :S when I try buy nothing happens :/[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Donation Shop
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

[quote=“knockudown, post:5, topic:387718”]Where to place the teleport thingy? how to see cords? Just under NPC or commands etc?

Btw Why it Won’t let me buy items from Donate shop? Its cost “Coins” normal coins :S when I try buy nothing happens :/[/quote]

The teleport code would go in with the rest of your commands. If in PI, the commands.java folder. If Delta, client.java. Just ask if you’re using a different source.

Usually there’s a command already added, like ::mypos or ::coords for you to see your position. You could stand in the spot you want, logout, then take the coords from your account.

With the buying items from the shop, I don’t know. I don’t know what source you’re using, and I don’t know anything about why it’s messing up.

Read full topic

item.title: Donation Shop
item.dc:creator: @knockudown knockudown
item.description:
@knockudown wrote:

[quote=“TimeBroken, post:2, topic:387718”]Teleport command…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(”teleport”)) { //Rename to staff or W/e your tele name will be.
teleportToX = XCoord; //Replace with your X Co-ord.
teleportToY = YCoord; // Replace with your Y Co-ord.
sendMessage(”You have been teleported to…”); // Change to the message it will send when you tele.
}

PS. You can’t rep++ anyone. ;P[/quote]

Add my msn : jensen_105@hotmail.com
How I make a shop, add items etc so they work

I got TeamViewer etc, If you want to help a newbie like me out lol

Read full topic

item.title: Donation Shop
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Teleport command…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(”teleport”)) { //Rename to staff or W/e your tele name will be.
teleportToX = XCoord; //Replace with your X Co-ord.
teleportToY = YCoord; // Replace with your Y Co-ord.
sendMessage(”You have been teleported to…”); // Change to the message it will send when you tele.
}

PS. You can’t rep++ anyone.

Read full topic
